name: Dwarven Realm
description:
Dwarven Realm

  • Explore an epic fantasy medieval world crafted on the Unreal Engine 5 where dwarves fight for survival in a hostile universe. In this captivating strategy/idle game, guide your colony of dwarves through unique challenges, tough moral choices, and unforgettable encounters. Explore, mine, upgrade, trade to ensure the prosperity of your people in a game where every decision matters. Are you ready to lead your own clan of dwarves? Dive into the adventure now!

    Gameplay

  • In this game, with an RTS camera view, you will lead a colony of dwarves on a hostile mountain, where the survival of your clan depends on your wise choices. Extract precious resources, expand your colony, and evade the dangers of this fantastical world. With rich gameplay mechanics and strategic depth, each playthrough is a unique adventure that will test your management skills and ingenuity.

    Narration

  • Dive into an immersive, choice-driven narrative where every decision shapes the destiny of your dwarf colony. In this captivating game, your leadership is put to the test as you guide your companions through an epic story. Get ready to embark on a narrative adventure where your decisions impact the world around you.

    Artistic Direction

  • Dwarven Realm offers an immersive stylized 3D art direction that plunges you into the epic world of dwarves. From majestic mountain landscapes to intricate details of dwarven structures, with the assistance of Unreal Engine 5, every visual element is carefully crafted to capture players' imagination.

    Project Status

  • Dwarven Realm is a student project developed from scratch in less than 3 months.
